title: Hanging
medium:
Medium: hemp, wool, acrylic plastic
Technique: tapestry weave
description: Vertical rectangle of natural hemp warp, loosely woven in colored wools, leaving much of the warp exposed. Meandering rows of rya knots in purplish wools alternate with irregularly shaped pieces of hand-colored acrylic in purples, mauves, blues, greens and yellow inserted in the weaving.
name: Hanging
